item.title: Docker Cheatsheet
item.description: List of handy docker commands View container logs docker logs CONTAINER_ID --follow Restart container docker restart CONTAINER_ID Stop all containers docker kill $(docker ps -q) Remove all containers docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) Remove all images docker rmi $(docker images -q) Create a custom bridge network docker network create -d bridge NETWORK_NAME Ref https://typeofnan.dev/how-to-stop-all-docker-containers/
